caption.p: Synthetic strategy and characterization of polymers and particles. (A) Synthesis of galactose terminal PHEA; (B) step growth process for the synthesis of gold nanoparticles; (C) SEC of Gal-PHEAs; (D) 19F NMR showing displacement of the pentafluorophenyl unit; (E) UV–vis spectroscopy of uncoated AuNPs; (F) DLS of uncoated AuNPs; (G–I) TEM of uncoated AuNPs. Scale bar = 100 nm.
